definition: hand formed into a flat shape, as for a karate chop
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: Deliver a back edge-hand blow against the wall with your left hand.
sentences.chinese: 用你的左手手刀反手打击墙壁。

definition: to hack/to chop/to split open/(of lightning) to strike
to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it

definition: to hit with a piercing blow
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
